name: @ping-identity/dvlint-base-rule-pack
description: Collection of base rules used to lint DaVinci flows.

rules.description: Verify several best practices for annotations nodes include checks on color, font and positions on the canvas

dv-bp-annotation-001.description: Found color not included in best practices list for annotation node
dv-bp-annotation-001.message: Annotation color is not in palette [%] (%)
dv-bp-annotation-001.recommendation: The annotation color is not part of the recommended palette. To ensure optimal results, use the suggested colors.

dv-bp-annotation-002.description: Found non-standard fontFamily used for Annotation
dv-bp-annotation-002.message: Annotation font is not in sans-serif [%] (%)
dv-bp-annotation-002.recommendation: The current annotation font is not Sans-Serif. For best clarity and consistency, it is recommended to use a Sans-Serif font

dv-bp-missing-title-annotation-001.message: Each flow should contain a title annotation node with a background color of #4462ed
dv-bp-missing-title-annotation-001.recommendation: This flow is missing a title annotation node with a proper description. To improve flow organization, add a title annotation node and set the background color to #4462ed.

dv-bp-title-not-on-top-001.description: Title annotation not on top of flow
dv-bp-title-not-on-top-001.message: The topmost node in your flow should be a title annotation (%)
dv-bp-title-not-on-top-001.recommendation: The title annotation node is not positioned at the top of the flow. For better readability, move the title annotation node to the top.

dv-bp-annotation-003.description: It is a best practice to include annotations to document your flow
dv-bp-annotation-003.recommendation: This flow lacks annotations. For improved clarity and structure, add annotations to the flow.

rules.description: Ensure the flow has debug mode turned off

dv-bp-debug-off-001.description: In flow settings, log level is currently set to Debug
dv-bp-debug-off-001.recommendation: The flow log level is set to Debug. For standard operation, it's recommended to set the log level to Info or None unless active troubleshooting is needed.

rules.description: Ensure the flow is not empty

dv-er-empty-flow-001.description: The flow has no nodes, it is empty
dv-er-empty-flow-001.recommendation: An empty flow has been found. If it's not being used, remove it.

rules.description: Perform a bunch of general checks that cleaning ability
Ensure logos are not hard coded and useCSS is used with a css logo tag.  Does not apply to subflows

dv-bp-logo-001.description: In flow settings, useCustomCSS not set to true
dv-bp-logo-001.recommendation: Use the recommended CSS settings for flows developed by Ping to ensure consistency.

dv-bp-logo-002.description: In flow settings, companyLogo class not included in custom CSS
dv-bp-logo-002.message: companyLogo class not included in custom CSS
dv-bp-logo-002.recommendation: Use the recommended CSS settings for flows developed by Ping to ensure consistency.

dv-bp-logo-003.description: Didn't find companyLogo environment variable in variables connector, this variable should be present in the flow.
dv-bp-logo-003.recommendation: Use the companyLogo environment variable for Ping-developed flows to ensure the correct branding.

dv-bp-logo-004.description: Didn't find companyName environment variable in variables connector, this variable should be present in the flow.
dv-bp-logo-004.recommendation: Use the companyName environment variable for Ping-developed flows to display the appropriate company name.

rules.description: Multiple potential start nodes, or disconnected nodes found

dv-er-multi-start-001.description: Multiple start points or floating node(s) found
dv-er-multi-start-001.message: Node % could be one of multiple start points, or floating
dv-er-multi-start-001.recommendation: The '%' node is either disconnected or has multiple starting points. Ensure that the node is correctly connected and has only one starting point.

dv-bp-node-001.description: All nodes should have a title
dv-bp-node-001.recommendation: The (% %) node is missing a title. For optimal clarity, add a descriptive title.

dv-bp-node-002.description: All success/error JSON nodes should proper colors
dv-bp-node-002.recommendation: The <%> is not using the correct color. To ensure consistency, use the recommended color: [%].

dv-bp-node-003.description: All nodes should have a description
dv-bp-node-003.recommendation: The (% %) node is missing a description. For optimal clarity, add a meaningful description.

dv-er-node-004.recommendation: A form is not selected in the <%> connector. Select a form to complete the configuration.

dv-er-node-001.recommendation: A disabled '%' node has been found. Consider removing it from the flow.

dv-er-node-002.recommendation: Configure a capability in <%> connector to ensure proper operation.

dv-er-pingOneFlow-001.description: Incorrect ending nodes for PingOne flow.
dv-er-pingOneFlow-001.message: Incorrect ending nodes for PingOne flow.
dv-er-pingOneFlow-001.recommendation: This PingOne-enabled flow is missing appropriate ending nodes. These flows should conclude with either a 'Return Success Response (Redirect Flows)' node or a 'Return Error Response (Redirect Flows)' node of the PingOne Authentication connector.

dv-er-subflow-001.recommendation: There is an incorrect or missing subflow in the (%) flow. Ensure that the appropriate subflow is selected and that the names match within the configuration.

dv-er-subflow-002.message: Circular SubFlow Dependency Found - '%' points back to '%' via subflow
dv-er-subflow-002.recommendation: In this subflow, '%' points back to '%', which can cause import and export errors. Configure the subflow to return to the parent flow.

dv-er-subflow-003.message: Input Schema values for '%' subflow is not configured.
dv-er-subflow-003.recommendation: The input schema values for the '%' subflow are not currently configured. Configure the schema in the subflow.

dv-er-teleport-001.recommendation: <%> is not being used. Consider removing it from the flow.

dv-er-teleport-002.message: Teleport schema mismatch.  Attribute '%' found, but not defined
dv-er-teleport-002.recommendation: Update the JSON to align with the Teleport node schema, ensuring that the '%' attribute is properly defined.

rules.description: Ensure that flow variables are used in flow.  And check for flow variables referenced in nodes but not defined

dv-er-variable-001.recommendation: The '%' variable has been found but is not utilized in the flow. Consider removing the unused variable.

dv-er-variable-002.description: Variable '%' used, but never defined in a Variable connector
dv-er-variable-002.message: Variable '%' used, but never defined in a Variable connector
dv-er-variable-002.recommendation: The '%' variable is not defined within a variable connector, which may lead to unexpected behavior. Define the variable appropriately.
